languages.text: {n}Высокий брюнет окидывает вас быстрым взглядом — воздух вокруг него чуть потрескивает от сверхъестественного холода. Камзол из дорогой ткани отмечен золотой строчкой и несколькими бурыми пятнами, на поясе висит психосиловой меч и {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}, а на груди сияет знак {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Священной Инквизиции{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий мужчина окидывает вас быстрым взглядом — воздух вокруг него чуть потрескивает от сверхъестественного холода. Камзол из дорогой ткани отмечен золотой строчкой и несколькими бурыми пятнами, на поясе висит силовой меч и {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}, а на груди сияет знак {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Священной Инквизиции{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий брюнет окидывает вас быстрым взглядом — воздух вокруг него чуть потрескивает от сверхъестественного холода. Камзол из дорогой ткани отмечен золотой строчкой и несколькими бурыми пятнами, на поясе висит психосиловой меч и {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}, а на груди сияет знак {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Священной Инквизиции{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his doublet is stitched with gold thread and marked by several brown spots. A force sword and a vox hang from his belt. The emblem of the Holy Inquisition is glittering on his chest.{/n}

The expensive fabric of his doublet is stitched with gold thread and marked by several brown spots. A force sword and a vox hang from his belt. The emblem of the Holy Inquisition is glittering on his chest.{/n}

A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位身材高大的黑发男人快速打量了你一眼。他周围的空气中充斥着超自然的寒意，发出了轻微的噼啪声。他的上衣由昂贵的布料制成，上面缝着金线，还沾着几个红褐色的污点。他的腰带上别着一把力场剑和一个{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置，{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}神圣审判庭{/g}的徽章在他胸前闪闪发光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身材高大的男人快速打量了你一眼。他周围的空气中充斥着超自然的寒意，发出了轻微的噼啪声。他的紧身上衣由昂贵的布料制成，上面缝着金线，还沾着几个红褐色的污点。他的腰带上别着一把力场剑和一个{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置，{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}神圣审判庭{/g}的徽章在他胸前闪闪发光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}背の高い黒髪の男があなたを見定めるように見つめた。超自然的な寒気が彼の周りの空気を静かになびいている。その高価なジャケットは金糸で縫われ、赤茶色の差し色がいくつも入れられている。ベルトにはフォースソードと{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}がぶら下がっており、胸には{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}神聖異端審問庁{/g}の紋章が光り輝いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}背の高い男はあなたを見定めるように見つめた。超自然的な寒気が彼の周りの空気を静かになびいている。その高価なダブレットは金糸で縫われ、赤茶色の差し色がいくつも入れられている。ベルトにはフォースソードと{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}がぶら下がっており、胸には{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}神聖異端審問庁{/g}の紋章が光り輝いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der große, dunkelhaarige Mann mustert dich mit einem schnellen Blick. Eine übernatürliche Kälte lässt die Luft um ihn herum leise knistern. Der teure Stoff seiner Jacke ist mit Goldfäden bestickt und weist mehrere rotbraune Flecken auf. An seinem Gürtel hängen ein Psischwert und ein {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}, und auf seiner Brust prangt das Emblem der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Heiligen Inquisition{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große Mann mustert dich mit einem schnellen Blick. Eine übernatürliche Kälte lässt die Luft um ihn herum leise knistern. Der teure Stoff seines Wamses ist mit Goldfäden bestickt und weist mehrere rotbraune Flecken auf. An seinem Gürtel hängen ein Psischwert und ein {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}, und auf seiner Brust prangt das Emblem der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Heiligen Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme de grande taille aux cheveux noirs vous jauge d'un rapide coup d'œil, alors qu'un froid surnaturel fait légèrement crépiter l'air autour de lui. Sa veste luxueuse est cousue de fil d'or et maculée de nombreuses taches brunes. Une épée de force et un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} sont accrochés à sa ceinture, et l'emblème de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sainte Inquisition{/g} resplendit sur sa poitrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme de grande taille vous jauge d'un rapide coup d'œil, alors qu'un froid surnaturel fait légèrement crépiter l'air autour de lui. Son pourpoint luxueux est cousu de fil d'or et maculé de nombreuses taches brunes. Une épée de force et un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} sont accrochés à sa ceinture, et l'emblème de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sainte Inquisition{/g} resplendit sur sa poitrine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El alto hombre de pelo oscuro te examina con un vistazo rápido, y un frío sobrenatural hace restallar levemente el aire que le rodea. La lujosa tela de su chaqueta está tejida con hilo de oro y salpicada de manchas de un marrón rojizo. Una espada de fuerza y un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} cuelgan de su cinturón, y el emblema de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sagrada Inquisición{/g} brilla en su pecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El alto hombre te examina con un vistazo rápido, y un frío sobrenatural hace restallar levemente el aire que le rodea. La lujosa tela de su jubón está tejida con hilo de oro y salpicada de manchas de un marrón rojizo. Una espada de fuerza y un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} cuelgan de su cinturón, y el emblema de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sagrada Inquisición{/g} brilla en su pecho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu ve kara saçlı adam, seni hızlıca bir süzüyor. Doğaüstü bir ürperti, etrafındaki havayı hafifçe çatırdatıyor. Pahalı kumaştan yapıldığı belli olan ceketi, altın iplikle dikilmiş ve üzerinde birkaç kırmızımsı kahverengi leke göze çarpıyor. Kemerinden bir kudret kılıcıyla bir de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sarkıyor, göğsünde ise {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Kutsal Engizisyon{/g} amblemi parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, dark-haired man sizes you up with a quick glance; a supernatural chill is making the air around him crackle softly. The expensive fabric of his jacket is stitched with gold thread and marked by several reddish brown stains. A force sword and a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} hang from his belt, and the emblem of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g} glitters on his chest.{/n}

Pahalı kumaştan yapıldığı belli olan ceketi, altın iplikle dikilmiş ve üzerinde birkaç kırmızımsı kahverengi leke göze çarpıyor. Kemerinden bir kudret kılıcıyla bir de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sarkıyor, göğsünde ise {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Kutsal Engizisyon{/g} amblemi parıldıyor.{/n}
